SEO_TITLE: ESLAND awards 2024 - Celebrating the best of streaming and content creators.
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best content creators from Spain, Latin America and Andorra - vote for your favorites! Celebrate the innovation and talent of Twitch, YouTube and more
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Film has the Oscars, music has the Grammys and streaming has the ESLAND. The awards that celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators in the Spanish-speaking community
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America and Andorra united by creators, creators and their communities, to remember and relive some of the best moments of the year.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two galas held, one at the Palau de la Música Catalana in Barcelona and the other at the Auditorio Nacional in Mexico City, the only thing left to do is to wait for the third edition in Andorra.
BENTO_TITLE_1: Andorra: The Zenith of the ESLAND awards
BENTO_CONTENT_1: A new edition loaded with news and content, which will begin several weeks before the eagerly awaited gala. Special directs, collaborations, concerts and much more in what will be a real party dedicated to the creation of content.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: An awards gala full of top-level content and many surprises, where you will discover the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: This year, the blue carpet moment will be replaced and enhanced, thanks to the incredible Andorran landscapes, by a white carpet in full snow, located on theAndorran ski slopes.
BENTO_CONTENT_4: This year, the reddit will not be part of the awards voting, but it will be part of the community. The official ESLAND Awards subreddit is open to you. Share your clips, opinions and interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: Guide to the 3rd Edition of the ESLAND Awards
